name: Spasla
body: ### Welcome to Spasla. Spasla is the leading designer and manufacturer of ionic propulsion systems. Spasla was founded in 2016 in the back of a van, with our minds and our morals. Here at Spasla we believe everyone deserves interstellar travel at a low cost, and now that is possible with the power of Spasla!!! ### Ground Breaking Technology Spasla engineers and programmers have designed and invented cutting edge ionic propulsion technology that is opening up new frontiers. Our brand new models include the SJAS-210 and the SJAS-200a.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
